sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hi ${employee.first_name},

The sport challenge ${challenge.name} you contributed to has been completed. Congratulations for your achievments! Please kleep participating in ourt other challenges.

That keeps you healthy and helps us with our fundraising for social projects, since we donate 50 € for every single contribution of our teams to our MentorMe Project to offer education to kids from disadvantaged families . So thanks again for helping us and others!

Click here to see the challenge and all contributions.

Many regards,

Yourt Sport Challenge Team
sysevent_email_template.name: GVS_SPORT Challenge completed
sysevent_email_template.subject: Sport challenge ${challenge.name} with number ${challenge.number} has been completed
